item.title: The art of controlling complexity
item.description: From Eloquent Javascript, by Marijn Haverbeke. Keeping programs under control is the main problem of programming. When a program works, it is beautiful. The art of programming is the skill of controlling complexity. Just a reminder, primarily for myself. As developers we not only have to solve problems, but do it in a way we do not harm our future-self.
